description: Great sync feature and encryption.
summary: The best app for taking Markdown notes and sync on multiple devices

description: The fact that this is free is amazing. A nice UI, clearly understandable settings, and easy to pick up and start taking notes. I say 'almost perfect' because sometimes the formatting changes when switching between editor modes, and because I'd like more features, from basics like coloured text to more options when it comes to attaching images (like being able to position it anywhere in the note, without using tables). Not sure how that would be rendered in markdown, however. Still, it's a 5/5 because those nitpicks are mostly personal preferences. Kudos to the developers!
It is Simple and organized, I use for my daily notes.

It is really amazing. You can take great notes using markdown, sync using cloud services and you can also encrypts notes.

Great great great!
summary: Best app to take notes and sync with other devices

description: Love it more than Evernote.
Simple and minimal editing, syncing, encryption. Wish I could reset synchronization settings for Onedrive though. I keep setting it up with the wrong account and having to re-install.
Great features including organizing with notebooks and tags, toggle between markdown and simple content formatting, e2e encryption and options to sync privately across different devices.
goooooooooooooooooooooood
Excellent notes app with good editor and mobile support.
This app has all of the good of OneNote and none of the bad. Quickly write Markdown files and notes with Joplin. Even sync works great!
Joplin is great app for keeping notes and web-pages. Web-clipper also works better than other alternatives. Kudos to Joplin team...
summary: Great note keeping and writing app

description: Pretty, pretty good.
Android version is almost high fidelity app. Love every aspect of it. It's like Trello for free and offline.
I've replaced Evernote with Joplin because it's more responsive and better for syncing.

Best app to keep my work notes clean, organized and in sync between linux, osx, ios and android. 

Thanks for the amazing work!

it's one of the best notes taking app, 
but it's not native app, it's just electron app..
and like a consequence is huge memory usage and freezes on big notes database
Agreeing with every other reviews here so far. Personally, I liked the exact KaTeX and rich markdown features of Joplin!

I've been trying to get into more and more FOSS lately, and tried out Joplin as an alternative to some of my other notetaking apps, and I've got to say it's blown me away. It's easily better than any of them, even if it weren't FOSS.
summary: Best app I've installed in a long time

description:
I adore the way we can sync our books and notes in such an easy way. This app also works well in Android. I hope it could someday work as Notion and become a powerful alternative in the productive apps niche.
9/10
summary: Best taking notes and cloud sync app

description: Even if Joplin is essentially a bloated electron app which takes ~500 mb, it is still good enough but I'm afraid on Android side it's even below mediocre. I guess I'll stick to Notion.
summary: Good on desktop, sucks hard on mobile

description:
I switched over from EverNote Premium to Joplin a few years ago and I am never switching back! Migrating is stupidly easy and the app itself is perfect for taking notes at school.

Using markdown is great for quick note taking and having several options and the app also has a "normal" text editor look that makes it easy for everyone to use. 

Syncing works flawlessly and gives you a few cloud storage options to use. I just use the dropbox option because it's the simplest but you can even upload everything to your own cloud storage!
summary: Perfect for students! The best alternative to EverNote

description: Can't start it, and it causes a total system crash every time I try.
summary: Was good, now causes system instability. Do not install

description: Love wide range of platforms supported, decentralized nature, markdown + KaTeX, smooth Nextcloud integration, E2E! Good job, Joplin team!

Even though this package can't recognise system dark theme, it still provides 4x better launching performance compared to official AppImage! Many thanks to maintainer for packing and supporting this amazing app
Great application!
Takes a few steps to setup (syncing via dropbox but encrypted) but worth it. Also the android version has been good for me.

The preview pictures show Joplin running on a mobile device with an adaptive UI that only shows one column at a time when the screen resolution is small. Unfortunately, it doesn't do this, and 3-4 columns of content are crammed together. This would be helpful for desktop too when snapping windows to smaller sizes.
summary: Not Mobile Optimized as Advertised in Preview Pictures

description: If you are used to using Evernote you might not like this application as an alternative, even though it is frequently advertised as such. The default note is using a markup language this means, you have to learn a markup language before you can enter a note properly. If you just enter a simple text note without markup you end up with all the text centered for some reason. The application is written as if the user is expected to do a bunch of work to get up and running and is not friendly. Avoid. Developers are resistant to suggestions to simplify things for new users, so I suspect the product will not grow into a large user base.
summary: Overly complex when it does not need to be

description:
After installation fails and does not run on Fedora 32 with Cinnamon.
The application is very good, I use Android, Linux and Windows.
I can share my notes between MacOS, android, iOS and Linux.
Excellent, complet, fonctionne avec nextcloud sans soucis. Idéal pour la prise de notes

Mon app préférée pour prendre des notes, et j'en ai essayé une bonne dizaine!!
Synchronisation par Nextcloud avec mon téléphone et mes autres ordis.
J'aime que c'est open source et que je reste en contrôle de mes données.
good application
Первое приложение, с которым изучаешь Markdown, не прилагая особых усилий, сразу видя при этом результат -- рендеринг форматированного текста на лету. Очень понравилась.
Позволяет синхронизироваться между устройствами с end-to-end шифрованием. Таким образом, можно не полагаться на доверие сотрудникам компаний через сервисы которых синхронизируешься.
Нехватает инструментов, странно, что даже всех заголовков нет, но зато все конвертирует и показывает нормально
自由开源软件的有一个好软件，方便笔记编辑，更好的是有拉取和网页同步。开心的不得了。向软件作者致敬。
